title: Princess Mononoke
creator_credit: Neil Gaiman and Nippon Television Network Corporation
brief_description: Ashitaka, a prince of the disappearing Emishi people, is cursed by a demonized boar god and must journey to the west to find a cure. Along the way, he encounters San, a young human woman fighting to protect the forest, and Lady Eboshi, who is trying to destroy it. Ashitaka must find a way to bring balance to this conflict.

constellations_other.name: Drawing on influences
constellations_other.description: Waves of animators have been inspired by the style of previous animators to help tell their own stories.

constellations_other.name: Speculative futures, sci-fi worlds and environmental disaster
constellations_other.description: Deborah Kelly's The Gods of Tiny Things explores extinction and the climate crisis, the scars of colonialism, and the political shift to the right around the world through collage and imagined futures, much like these sci-fi, animated and computer-generated artworks.
